title: Sizing Plots and Files for Paper
text: papersize includes data standard paper sizes including sizes papers (ANSI, ISO, standards), photo prints, postcards, playing cards. papersize includes plotting functions create lists ggplot2 plots repeated elements can assembled patchwork page layouts print. example, plot_cards() creates list Poker-card sized plots can tiled onto letter-size patchwork save print.   papersize currently limited features additional features expected include better support multi-page layouts, control position card elements, preset card formats/designs, appropriate handling cut-lines DIY card printing.
